original_text: They started to travel for the first time, in the way that the Lord had told them to do, through Moses.
korean_text: 이와 같이 그들이 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하신 것을 따라 행진하기를 시작하였는데

sentences.original_text: They started to travel for the first time
in the way that the Lord had told them to do
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 그들에게 하라고 명하신 그 길로
